name: 希安纳德·格雷戈里
name_full: 希安纳德·格雷戈里 Sianad Gregory

last_movies.title: 沉默的天使 第二季

introduction: Sianad's love of performing first became apparent during her regular dance classes at the Shirley and Mandy Morris School of Dance back home in the small town of Aberdare, South Wales. This initial introduction to all styles of dance and performance lead to her winning a scholarship to attend the prestigious Laine Theatre Arts School from which she graduated in 2006. Since then she has continued to keep her career as diverse and varied as when she first began her training all those years ago...In the commercial dance world Sianad has worked extensively for huge international choreographers such as Jaquel Knight (award winning choreographer for Beyonce's Single Ladies), the notorious Brian Friedman (responsible for Britney Spears' Slave For You and of course creative director of The X Factor) and Will Tucket (choreographer for The Royal Ballet) to name but a few.Alongside her dance career Sianad has also managed to pursue her passion for acting. Having landed guest roles in both Casualty and Holby City for the BBC and Caerdydd for welsh language channel S4C she made the move into feature films with a supporting role in Phil Claydon's Lesbian Vampire Killers opposite James Corden and Matthew Horne. She has also been seen in cinemas around the globe playing the role of ballet bitch Chloe in the hugely successful British dance film STREETDANCE 3D.
